name: Get Some Sleep or You'll Die!
name_original: Get Some Sleep or You'll Die!
description: This is a single player 2d adventure game about a college student named May Goldfish, who must balance schoolwork, fun, household obligations, and of course, sleep. One false move, and it's curtains! There is one good ending and eight grisly-sounding (but not visibly gory) deaths. The creative process of the game and most of its art and sound resources were created by children in the Miller School of Art video game camp - Summer 2016.
